website_summaries.verdict: Thicker than your usual green screen, this model is highly durable and long-lasting. Flocked cotton tends to produce better results.
pros: Crafted from 100% flocked cotton material at 150GSM, which helps reduce light escaping through the screen
Includes a 3.4-inch rod pocket sewn into the top for ease of hanging
cons: Users recommend opening up the screen outside and shaking down due to loose fibers

customer_reviews.title: Great economic green screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice quality Muslin Cotton fabric. Its thick enough to be opaque with a little back lighting, not see thru. The color is rich and works very easily with Adobe After Effects software. I recommend washing it and drying, then immediately hanging it while hot from the drier, that will remove folds and prevent wrinkling. I do not have the screen pulled taunt, so there are shadowed areas but the software works pretty well with these slight color variances.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It may look like a bed sheet, but works beautifully as a green screen for Zoom - Good price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2014 MacBook that lacks the ability to generate a virtual background for Zoom conferences. I saw this here on Amazon and liked it both for its relatively low price and fact shipper could get it to me in a couple of days. It really works beautifully, in that Zoom instantly recognized the color and allowed me to use virtual backgrounds that were well saturated and stable. The screen really looks more like a flannel sheet, which makes it easy to hang (I hang with a couple of binder clips on a curtain rod), but it made in such a way you could slide a rod through it for hanging purposes. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Sherman

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!! for Starting Up.
customer_reviews.text: ZOOM!! ZOOM ROOMS!!!! All the cool kids are doing it!!!! This green screen is so easy to set up, pack away, adjust...it's the perfect home office piece of equipment for taking your Zoom Room to the professional level. I read reviews about how it's not very stable for outdoor shoots. This Is NOT your outdoor shoot set up. Sure, it can be used for that, but it's designed for indoor use, product photography, wedding shots, YouTube video backdrops. Things that newbies and professionals are equally as involved in. I LOVE it. It has boosted the production value of my videos and conferences by a power of TEN!
customer_reviews.author: Bread Head

customer_reviews.title: If you're doing green screen in OBS Studio or zoom, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you just hang green fabric behind you and call it a day, you're going to have a bad experience. You will need to tune it and light the background properly. Getting wrinkles out will help too. It doesn't need to be perfect, but the fewer the better. I built an 8' x 6' frame out of spare 1x3s I had laying about and clamped the fabric to the frame. I faced the softer side towards the camera, and backlit the sheer side with bright but diffuse indirect light. A little bit of tuning of the chroma key and this worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Kaelber

customer_reviews.title: excellent green backdrop
customer_reviews.text: good green backdrop, but a bit small. carefully consider size of what you want to do...if people involved, this is too small. The above was my original review. After the company saw my review, they sent me the larger size totally free of charge. Wow! i changed my ranking to 5 star for such attentive company support. the screen itself is great. when you order make sure the size you order is adequate for your needs. If you have adults involved, the smaller size is too small. Just get the bigger size, and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: bhd

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG screen. It will easily cover a wall, I had to fold the bottom a little to keep it off the floor. My only suggestion would to iron it BEFORE you tack it to the wall (or pole). If you try to iron it on the wall it will get little tears in the fabric. Other than that, it does the job. Great for Chroma keying yourself into exotic locations. Have fun. UPDATE: The company called me & told me a trick to getting out the wrinkles. Put boiling water in a spray bottle & spray it on the fabric. Awesome customer service to call me from China to give me this tip!
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service
customer_reviews.text: I left a 4 star review before, because of the little shrunk after wash. But I am so impressed with the following up customer service. So I decided I will give a 5-star review and I highly recommended this seller and this product. I already sent the link to one of my photographer friend. She will get one pretty soon. I am doing my weekly knitting online show <A New Vision Of Knitting>(in Chinese) with green screen.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: it works extremely well for chromakey
customer_reviews.text: it works extremely well for chromakey. my suggestion is to buy a spray bottle. what you do is hang this up to where you what it. tighter the better. then you lightly mist the fabric and while it is wet smooth with your hand. this will take out all the creases leaving you with a nice flat surface. after it dries you may need to do i a second time. it worked for me and i have absolutely no creases in my background. also get a lint roller to pick up any balls of stray fluff you may find. i am extremely happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Pure trash
customer_reviews.text: Pure garbage. Im disappointed because i got one from the same link that was huge and top quality. I just got a smaller one and its a thin bed sheet and thats all. A tiny amout of light goes right through it. Im guessing they switched companies to get the fabric bit no longer any good.
customer_reviews.author: Peredy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backdrop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backdrop. I'm a teacher and I purchased this backdrop to shoot green screen videos for my students. I have had no problems at all and the kids love the end result. Wrinkles are easily steamed out when done carefully or, if you have time, just leave it out hanging for about a day prior to shooting your footage. I also used this to shoot promotional videos for my friend's business and it was perfect. I'm not a professional, but this definitely suits my needs. I am considering purchasing one to leave in my classroom and one for home.
customer_reviews.author: S. DeRose

customer_reviews.title: Great overall but not sure how long the fabric will last
customer_reviews.text: Im using professional lighting clips to hold up the fabric. I did notice some discoloration when using strong clips. So im avoiding using them now. Overall the fabric is used for my daughters daily zoom calls so the background can be replace with themes. For the price it was better than getting a new computer that supports realtime background replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good for Green Screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work as I needed to have a virtual background with webex. This worked perfectly with chromakey and I spent a few more dollars building a stand from PVC pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Zoom-ready, very sharp background image
customer_reviews.text: Draped it over a standard rolling wardrobe rack, "velvet" side on the outside, didn't even have to clamp or attach it to the rack, stayed put, presented a relatively smooth green surface, emulating Chroma Green. Rolled it behind me, fired up Zoom, updated settings to indiacenI have a green screen, designated a background image. Looks great! Tried a variety of images, all worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Surfrack

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the money! 6x10' Chromakey Green Muslin Photo Video Background
customer_reviews.text: Very wrinkled. Worked well once I steamed out the wrinkles. Have to use clips in order to get a nice smooth screen. It’s also little on the thin side, but gets the job done. Definitely see through if hanging with max lighting. However, the price is right. I would recommend this back-drop for novice - intermediate projects. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: The size and quality of this are perfect for the needs of a small studio. It arrived well packed and gently folded. The minor creases settled out within a short time and I was able to use the flocked side for a perfect key in OBS with very little fiddling with lights or levels. I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fertal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove background from photos
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right size I was looking for. My other one was way too big and bulky. It is also a pretty tight weave so nothing shows through under bright lights. Used a steamer to get rid of the winkles and almost all of them came out the first time. This makes it very easy to remove the background from photos with free programs like paint.net . Very important and saves time.
customer_reviews.author: Crawdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This fabric wrinkles a bit more than a much more expensive man-made fabric, but with the right frame and clips, most of the wrinkles don't show. If you do need to remove the wrinkles, then use a steamer to take them out while the fabric is hanging on the rack. There is no use in attempting to get the wrinkles out beforehand, unless you have a bus--like I have--to transport it without folding. I have attempted to roll the fabric to minimize the folds, but this takes about as long as steaming the fabric later. I also need to steam out the more expensive version so why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience
customer_reviews.text: Came with a few deep creases other then that good quality. Wow, the company has been trying to reach out to me for 3 months to fix the issue and make me happy, they recommend a few tips to help with creases that worked as well as sending me out another one for free. 5* for customer service and a amazing customer service team highly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden martinez

customer_reviews.title: It was inexpensive. Which is good because it's also cheap.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly crafted green sheet. Like a bedsheet you'd get at the dollar store a week after St. Patrick's day in a town with a long history of disliking the Irish for some made up reason nobody remembers from three generations ago. Much, much darker than the neon green shown on Amazon. It is not smooth and creases easily. The stitching is poorly done. But, for like 15 bucks... it's a green sheet.
customer_reviews.author: nunyabidniss

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: With all the Zoom and Web-Ex meetings through COVID I purchased this to enhance my digital environment and it works great. The muslin is very large so it doesn't need to be too close. For an inexpensive backdrop, it would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Years later still intact.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this green screen for years. It is sturdy and works great with any programs that can use green screens.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Honest sizing and if you use a spray bottle mister and hang it with some clamps to pull at it the wrinkles go away. I have no issue with the color. I pulled a nice matt with it. My only issue is that I wish there was a "pocket" both ways so I can hang it the other way.
customer_reviews.author: MogoreTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, great quality. Very soft, obviously had some creases from being folded but they weren't bad and were expected. Works very well with my webcam and video editing software (Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate) as well as my capture software (OBS Studio). Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - good value!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy material - good color - like the way it fits on the backdrop pole versus using clamps to hang it. Still used clamps to tighten the sides and it worked great - took out a few little wrinkles we were too lazy to iron out. Like the size of it for larger scenes and videos - and was a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recording on VR
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this to record himself on his Virtual Reality games. He loves it and is the perfect size for his room!
customer_reviews.author: angel_elicia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sizes and had to return one. The experience was wonderful! They are so nice. I love the quality of the green screen material. This is a company with great products and amazing customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex N

customer_reviews.title: Green scream for green screen!
customer_reviews.text: Truly not a bad product at all! Gets the job done. Great for an easy quick project. Did notice sone threads that were undoing but not a big deal to me. It is thick but also very light. Can bleed through but if positioned correctly against a wall you wont have a problem at all!! Id recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping addict

customer_reviews.title: Good product, maybe a little dark.  Make sure you have good external lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of fun with this playing with my daughter and making videos. Just make sure you have good lighting as this screen is pretty dark. I hung it up with some green thumbtacks I had purchased from amazon and they were more than capable of holding it up despite it being fairly heavy. It also comes with a nice storage bag which was a nice bonus, I thought.
customer_reviews.author: evildoer993

customer_reviews.title: Great thick quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality green screen for the price . We use it for gag photos during Christmas time and we lost our other one so we did not want to spend a lot. This was a great price and it was really big
customer_reviews.author: SaraSmile29

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What do you expect for around $15 to your door. I am going to get a PVC tube and wrap it around it. Someone suggested spraying wrinkle free on it and put in dryer.Definitely much thicker than any sheet I have ever seen. Great thickness for the purpose and price. Pleasantly surprised after some of the comments a little noncommittal. So far as actual size I have not measured. Will buy Prism next time, only bigger.
customer_reviews.author: E. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice green screen works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice green screen it works perfectly you might want to invest in a portable handheld steamer to get those wrinkles out
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! We were playing with this to change backgrounds.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Hipolito

customer_reviews.title: See thru
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, if you have it hanging light shines thru it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with Zoom virtual background
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it was advertised for. I used it with Zoom
customer_reviews.author: Crights

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good for hobby video work...
customer_reviews.text: It has a bit of a texture, so if you're trying to get the absolute best green screen in low-light situations, this might not be the best product - but if you're not doing anything tooo serious, or you have good consistent lighting, this is great for the money. Mine came with a convenient bag to carry it with.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price for Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to know that there are still some honest sellers out there who are committed to providing great quality even when they sell at a cheap price. The quality of this backdrop is amazing for the price. Thank you Prism!
customer_reviews.author: NaturalPoet

customer_reviews.title: Really Thick and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This looks so cheap in the photo, but it's really a nice one, very thick. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: reasonable quality
customer_reviews.text: It is made of what seems heavy and durable material (heavier than bed sheet). My only take is the degree of green. I was expecting it a bit brighter green. ----- Update: the seller read my review and decided that I was not satisfied so they provided me with a full refund!! Wow. I would buy from this seller any given day as now I know they are aiming to please.
customer_reviews.author: Ray T.

customer_reviews.title: worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Best $19 I've spent in a while. I use this for my backdrop at my home office for virtual meetings. I enjoy being able to change my backdrop depending on my mood or the type of meeting.
customer_reviews.author: kel_jh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great green screen: good threat quality and no reflection. My daughter asked me to buy it for her, and she is happy with it. I also should mention the company that sells it: Cheetah Mounts. There was a small issue with the delivery, but their customer service is fantastic. They did something excellent that I never expected and I thank them for that. A company that can be trusted.
customer_reviews.author: aalxndrv

customer_reviews.title: I liked the backdrop
customer_reviews.text: I liked the backdrop, and it works for what I wanted it for. The only reason it loses a star is because one of the pictures indicates that it comes with a carrying bag, and one was not included with the backdrop. It's disappointing that I have to use the plastic wrap that surrounded the cloth. Otherwise, no problems so far. Odd things that it did include was a mini flashlight and a small terry cloth. I would rather have that carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good for Zoom background
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for the green screen background in zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad D. Milner

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who makes videos for our church. I needed something to start with and he really liked it. Yes it comes with some wrinkles and its folded so the lines are very visible but you can always iron it. It's really great for the price and for people who are barely started. The color is a tad darker than the picture but that's fine. Nonetheless great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: _Hocus_

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. But decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pros- -I got the green screen in a timely manner. - it seems to be of decent quality - dimensions are as advertised Cons- -it came slightly damaged -it had what seemed to be oil on it. -it was not green chromakey as in pictures and description. -Darker green then advertised
customer_reviews.author: Jericho York

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: 1, Reason why I chose : To make the digital retouching job easier. 2, like & dislike : I bought this for the headshot background. It made the photoshop work drastically easier. This works really. 3, Recommend this product to : For $10, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Sabako

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my class project
customer_reviews.text: The crease of the folds did not affect the green screen at all. Also 6 ft x 10ft was a lot larger than I expected. Worked great for my class project.
customer_reviews.author: EFS

customer_reviews.title: Great green-screen cloth.
customer_reviews.text: Yikes I did it - made my first green video clip. This is a great product at a low price.
customer_reviews.author: George Novis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well for my needs, my only complaint is that it is a bit thin, though as long as there are no right sources behind it it works perfectly. It is also a good idea to iron it thoroughly before use because it comes rather wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Sov

customer_reviews.title: Green Screen Fun
customer_reviews.text: This fabric easily wrinkles, but otherwise it's fully functioning as a green screen. Just bring along a handheld steamer and wrinkles aren't an issue! Put yourself or your friends and family into any background you want! Pretend you have photographic evidence of your trip to Greece!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Cummins

customer_reviews.title: ... X 10' sheet of green screen muslin is a great thing to have for my small studio
customer_reviews.text: the 6' X 10' sheet of green screen muslin is a great thing to have for my small studio. running a Prop & Costume Studio, the material is great to display my props with, integrated with a nice photo shop program helps me to dazzle up my props for the exhibit circuits. very good buy ! T / EPS.
customer_reviews.author: EMPERIAL PROPS STUDIOSTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Terrific price for this. I'ver read of people having to iron the folds but to be honest it really doesn't need it if it is properly lighted. I also stretched the cloth slightly on a DIY PVC pipe frame and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific green screen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality backdrop for most casual applications such as streaming or video effects. Longer than most my needs but I'm glad to know if I need extra, like for full body recordings or something, it will be there.
customer_reviews.author: goffballz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is what it is, and it does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: I like to use these backdrops for different parties I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these backdrops for different parties I have throughout the year. I make a homemade picture booths. This backdrop arrived well package and was a very good quality. I was very impressed. It worked out well with my Mardi Gras theme, all I did was add it My homemade Mardi Gras masks, it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Lovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: It did have a small stain when it arrived but it cleaned up nicely and is working great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Superb product for the price. Video editing software has no problems picking out the "green". It did have a small stain when it arrived but it cleaned up nicely and is working great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: David Cybulski

customer_reviews.title: material has nice look to it but definitely needs to be ironed/steamed ...
customer_reviews.text: Works... material has nice look to it but definitely needs to be ironed/steamed before 1st use as creases from packing are very prominent. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RealGL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you also get a stand to hang it from and some lighting. Once you have these components you will be happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Thin and see through. Works against a wall but that is it. You can't free hang this or move it around unless it is flat against something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Far better quality than the last one I bought. Actual fabric, hemmed, etc. Good stuff. Comes in a box so it will have to be ironed before hanging, but excellent quality. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dudefer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Functional Green-Screen Cloth!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great green-screen cloth for the price! I bought it to use in my classroom, and it works great with the iPad app we use. It does show light through it if you place it near a window. Therefore, I would suggest putting it against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Just as described by seller. Good quality material. Color worked great in Camtasia video (meaning it was easy to erase). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no green screen expert, but I was able to key this screen in perfectly using Sony Vegas Pro. The product image looked a little washed out on my laptop, but I was pleased to find that the fabric is nice and bold. No complaints - I would absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: army103

customer_reviews.title: its affordable, n its cloth, had to spent ...
customer_reviews.text: its affordable, n its cloth, had to spent 40 minutes ironing out the wrinkles. but i guess thats with all green screen
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, works perfectly as a green screen.
customer_reviews.text: Very fine green screen, works perfectly and well worth the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff David

customer_reviews.title: Much better than what I used in the
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for video's. Much better than what I used in the past
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY product
customer_reviews.text: great backdrop - easy to use and perfect color background
customer_reviews.author: als.josh

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit darker in person
customer_reviews.text: Well it is obviously not as green as the image in the screenshot. Quite a bit darker in person. But the material is very thick quality and has a ring loop at the top for use with a stand. Worked for what I needed it for. Just hoped it was one shade lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly in a chromakey application. Its tough to get the wrinkles out, even when ironing, but that is not a big deal for still shooting. Decent material - seems durable, comes with a pocket sewn-in for a backdrop rod and a cloth storage/carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does what its intended to do
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable material, it does what it's intended to do. My only complaint is I wish it was a lighter shade of green but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This screen worked fine for our purpose. The color was darker than shown however, and after lots of ironing still had stubborn wrinkles. For the price however it is a nice and sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Yarrow10

customer_reviews.title: Not quite that thick
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sized fabric, it's just that it's a bit too thin :( I bought this to use it for streaming and the background light bleeds through. For the price I understand, and it is a little bit darker than the picture posted.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I would point out how major the wrinkles are but all photographers or videographers know that lighting, angles and editing skills are what makes the thing an A+ product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with this purchase and its working great for twitch ...
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned the material might be to thin but this screen is actually thicker then a bed sheet and is a thick material. Really happy with this purchase and its working great for twitch streaming.
customer_reviews.author: lex

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality backdrop ,the fabric is thick and well made. edges are well stitched. no complain.
customer_reviews.author: Essam A. Gndelee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for a coworker and me for green screen gaming as well as I use mine for photography.
customer_reviews.author: David F Ramey

customer_reviews.title: It’s green.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a green piece of fabric. By no means is this Chroma Key Green. Pictures are nothing close to product I received color wise.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great green screen, I wanted something for just starting out with green screening and this was perfect, the price was really nice and I am very happy with the quality of the material.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the corners is damaged when item arrived. The quality is meh...
customer_reviews.author: Cyka

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, and great overall
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and for the price this cannot be beat. Even in lousy lighting conditions, this has worked very well with dropping out a background and imposing videos into other videos.
customer_reviews.author: Seduce & Destroy

customer_reviews.title: ... on YouTube and this allows us to cheaply add cool backgrounds to add a professional look to his videos
customer_reviews.text: My son likes to record video game/toy reviews on YouTube and this allows us to cheaply add cool backgrounds to add a professional look to his videos. I want to encourage his creative side and this has been a fun, inexpensive way to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: James White

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Screen for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a full green screen "package" with lights and frame, and purchased this green screen to give me a little more coverage and some options with use. It is a great green screen! Very good weight material and packaged nicely! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JE Bewley

customer_reviews.title: This green screen is nice simple and a pretty good size to fit up ...
customer_reviews.text: This green screen is nice simple and a pretty good size to fit up to 4 people at a time
customer_reviews.author: Marck_004

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality, especially for the price. It works well, and was packaged perfectly. Came clean and nicely folded. I have not attempted to wash it yet though, so could not tell you how it holds up in the wash. But I recommend this green screen!
customer_reviews.author: SometimesYouFeelLikeANut

customer_reviews.title: This product is good, works well as a green screen
customer_reviews.text: This product is good, works well as a green screen, I learned lighting is very important! I need to invest is some lights!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what you in particular would need a chroma key for, but if you're a photographer, this is pretty cool for small portraits. It's not really big enough for more than maybe two people, but it's a high quality screen, and I really like mine!

customer_reviews.text: GOOD PARTS *Great Quality *Arrived 5 Days Earlier then expected *Includes Black Bag for Storage and Transportation BAD PARTS *Has some loose threads hanging from it This is a great green screen, especially for the quality and the price! customer_reviews.title: Great Screen but Hard to Iron
customer_reviews.text: This green screen works really well for making videos and all of it was removed perfectly when using a chroma-key software tool. The only downside is that the screen came folded and was difficult to iron.

product_meta.title: Prism Backdrop by Ravelli 6x10' Black Muslin Photo Video Background, 100% Cotton, 150GSM Weight, Flocked on One Side, (5.7x9’ after pre-shrinkage)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:6 x 10' (5.7 x 9' Preshrunk)

This is a 100% cotton backdrop made from a loose weave pattern with relatively thick thread. This initial size of the fabric is 6x10’, but after heat treatment the actual size is approximately 5.7x9’. Prism Backdrops by Ravelli are offered in three standard sizes: 

10X20' (actually 9X18', 5.7lbs)

 10X12' (actually 9X10.8', 3.8lbs)

 6X10' (actually 5.7X9', 1.9lbs)

 The material is 100% cotton which can wrinkle significantly. 100% cotton offers very good photographic results, but some combination of hanging, spraying, ironing, steaming and/or photo editing may be necessary to deal with wrinkles and shadows. 


100% cotton is also heavy and is a woven material. The weight can be excessive for some background stands. And the weave pattern can allow a certain amount of bleed through from background lighting. Prism Backdrops attempt to achieve the best possible balance of weight and light handling characteristics for the photographer.


 All sides are stitched to avoid unraveling and a 3.4" rod pocket is sewn into the top. Each backdrop is folded and comes in a plastic bag to avoid moisture and stains and then each bag is packed in a cardboard box for shipping.
feature_bullets: 100% Cotton Material for Best Possible Images
150GSM Thicker Weight Fabric versus Industry Standard 120GSM
Flocked on one side for better light absorption
Bright and True Colors, Single Piece Seamless Design, 3.4” Rod Pocket, Stitched Edges
Ravelli Backdrops come with a Lifetime warranty
